name: Jingle Boi's Wrath
description:
Jingle Boi was fooled by Athena to spend their remaining days in the Frigus Domain, can you escape from this frigid hell and get back to your sweetie Patroclus in time for the winter festivities?

Controls:
Keyboard:
WASD - Move
IJKL - Shoot
Space - Dash
Controllers (works with Xbox, PlayStation, and SwitchPro- only tested with Xbox):
Left Stick - Move
Right Stick - Shoot
Triggers - Dash
